Package org.ginsim.core.graph.regulatorygraph

Interface RegulatoryGraph

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Graph<RegulatoryNode,​RegulatoryMultiEdge>, GraphModel<RegulatoryNode,​RegulatoryMultiEdge>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends Graph<RegulatoryNode,​RegulatoryMultiEdge>
    The regulatory graph
